砍.definition: to chop; to cut down; to throw sth at sb

砍傷.definition: to wound with a blade or hatchet; to slash; to gash

砍價.definition: to bargain; to cut or beat down a price

砍樹.definition: to chop wood; to chop down trees

砍死.definition: to hack to death; to kill with an ax

砍殺.definition: to attack with a bladed weapon

砍頭不過風吹帽.pinyin: kan3 tou2 bu4 guo4 feng1 chui1 mao4
砍頭不過風吹帽.definition: to regard decapitation as no more important than the wind blowing off your hat (idiom)
